title: Inception
plotSummary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology...

title: The Dark Knight
plotSummary: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham.

title: Interstellar
plotSummary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Avatar
plotSummary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

title: The Matrix
plotSummary: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Titanic
plotSummary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Gladiator
plotSummary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plotSummary: A meek Hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
plotSummary: The fellowship continues its quest to destroy the One Ring while facing the rising power of Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plotSummary: The final battle for Middle-earth begins and Frodo and Sam approach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring.

title: Forrest Gump
plotSummary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

title: Pulp Fiction
plotSummary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Fight Club
plotSummary: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plotSummary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Se7en
plotSummary: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plotSummary: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

title: The Godfather
plotSummary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather Part II
plotSummary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: The Departed
plotSummary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Whiplash
plotSummary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing.

title: The Social Network
plotSummary: The story of the founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed.

title: Joker
plotSummary: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.

title: Parasite
plotSummary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Spirited Away
plotSummary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

title: The Prestige
plotSummary: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.
